alert.note: Alert for Carter; Jefferson; Stephens (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 3:04PM CDT until July 29 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Jefferson County in southern Oklahoma... Southeastern Stephens County in southern Oklahoma... Northwestern Carter County in southern Oklahoma... * Until 345 PM CDT. * At 304 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ringling, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Healdton, Ringling, Velma, Tatums, Loco, Ratliff City, Cornish and Fox. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
